channel.title: I like when people say No Lag when they post a server
channel.description: I'm just like, you must not know what lag is then.

item.title: I like when people say No Lag when they post a server
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

Edit: OOOOH. i forgot minecraft isnt in “beta” now lol.

Read full topic
item.source: I like when people say No Lag when they post a server

item.title: I like when people say No Lag when they post a server
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:16, topic:436874”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=539589.msg3964024#msg3964024 date=1333541707]

I dunno badger you are always right, i had a time where webpages would load very good but moparcraft was laggy as can be, i mean 1 chunk loaded and the rest didn’t, noone else had this problem so yeah your right, completely correct.

this topic isnt even about moparcraft, i know its laggy, nor where does moparcraft claim that it doesnt lag?

and moparcraft never lags for me except when the server itself is lagging, it puts little to no strain on my network.
[/quote]That was right when we updated to beta 1.2

Funny, moparcraft isn’t on 1.2?[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: I like when people say No Lag when they post a server

item.source: I like when people say No Lag when they post a server

item.title: I like when people say No Lag when they post a server
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:11, topic:436874”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=539589.msg3961974#msg3961974 date=1333384111]

and then you get on and your own network lags so you accuse the server of being laggy while it’s your cheap internet connection

because if it were our own internet connections, it wouldnt be obvious because we definitely dont browse the internet while playing minecraft so we wouldnt see the other pages load slow as well

why are you so ignorant

why are you comparing webbrowsing to a multiplayer game??
[/quote]

oh idk maybe because both use internet connections and are slow if your internet itself sucks[/quote]minecraft uses a single connection and sends a lot of time-sensitive data. http uses multiple connections and downloads a chunk of data every time a page is requested. not comparable at all…

Read full topic

item.title: I like when people say No Lag when they post a server
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

deathwilldie0:

And then you realize the school your at has 60mbps download and 40 mbps upload and it’s the fastest internet you’ve ever had but yet the server still lags.

its caused by the connection you have to the server, not your internet speed. I seem to lag alot of a server is being hosted on the other side of the world.

Read full topic
